title: BRIEF-Stor-Age Property REIT Says Prudential Investment Managers Holds 5.54% Of Total Number Of Securities In Co
text:
BRIEF-Stor-Age Property REIT Says Prudential Investment Managers Holds 5.54% Of Total Number Of Securities In Co

Stock Markets 20 minutes ago (Oct 01, 2019 11:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Stor-Age Property REIT Says Prudential Investment Managers Holds 5.54% Of Total Number Of Securities In Co Oct 1 (Reuters) - Stor-Age Property REIT Ltd : * JSE: SSS - NOTICE OF ACQUISITION OF A BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN SECURITIES * STOR-AGE PROPERTY REIT - BENEFICIAL INTEREST HELD BY PRUDENTIAL INVESTMENT MANAGERS AMOUNTS TO 5.54% OF TOTAL NUMBER OF SECURITIES IN ISSUE OF CO
